pages.text:
Cape Coral Racquet Club
Cape Coral’s Premier Place For Tennis | Call Today:
(239) 573-3210
capecoralracquetclub@gmail.com
FULL SERVICE BABOLAT DEALER
PRIVATE LESSONS AND COURT RESERVATIONS
SATURDAY KIDS LESSONS FOR ALL AGES & EXPERIENCE LEVELS
BALL MACHINE RENTALS
CCRC Announcements
CCRC Court Info
Monday – Friday:  7:30 am – 8:30 pm
Saturday: 8:30 am – 4 pm
Sunday: By reservation  Members only
Members & Guests Welcome!
Call Today: (239) 573-3210
Cape Coral Racquet Club
Call Us: (239) 573-3210
1213 Ceitus Terrace Cape Coral, Florida 33991
It’s never too late to learn to play tennis
Member & Guest Services
Call Us: (239) 573-3210
1213 Ceitus Terrace Cape Coral, Florida 33991
It’s never too late to learn to play tennis
Member & Guest Services
CCRC PRO SHOP
Full Service Babolat Dealer
Racquet Stringing
New & Demo Racquets
Monday – Friday: 8:00 am – 3:00 pm         Saturday 9:00 am – 2:00 pm
We use Babolat string
CCRC KIDS PROGRAMS
We have classes for kids 7 years old and up
We also have middle school and high school groups.
Contact us
for additional information.
PRIVATE TENNIS LESSONS
Regardless of your age or experience
CCRC’s Tennis Pros are ready to get on the court with you to help you bring your game to the next level.
Tennis lessons are available Monday – Saturday by reservation for members & guests! $35 half hour and $65 hour lesson
Call (239) 573-3210 to find out more!
Court Reservations
CCRC has 10 Har-Tru Tennis courts, with lighting so you can play all day & night! Our Tennis courts are available to members Monday to Friday 8:00a to 9:00p.
New to Cape Coral or visiting CCRC? Call us today to reserve your court!
Ball Machine Rentals
Ball machine rentals are available to members & guests, call ahead or stop by our pro shop & perfect your tennis serve!
Members $10.00/hour & Guests $25.00/hour
Full Service Babolat Dealer & More
Grips & Wristbands | Tennis Racquets and Demo Racquets | Racquet Restringing | Tennis Balls |
Pro Shop Hours Monday – Friday: 8:00 am – 1:00 pm Saturday 8:30 – 1:00
Lee County Women’s Teams 2024-2025
3.0-    3.0    3.5-    3.5    4.0-    4.0
Nickel -Copper – Silver – Cobalt – Gold
A Few Of Our Reviews on
Faceboo
k
&
Google.
Had a blast as a guest at Cape Coral Racquet Club!
Peg Casey
5 Stars - February 2018
https://www.facebook.com/pg/capecoralracquetclub/reviews
–
Facebbok
Absolutely amazing people there. So much fun !!!! The courts are so well maintained. Nancy the owner is so sweet ! Tennis Coaches Arron and Lori are just awesome !!!
Melissa Bradbury
5 Stars - February 2018
https://www.facebook.com/pg/capecoralracquetclub/reviews
–
Facebbok
GREAT! Best place to play tennis in Cape Coral.
JeroX
5 Stars - June 2017
https://www.google.com/search?q=Capecoralracquetclub+reviews&oq=Capecoralracquetclub+reviews&aqs=chrome..69i57j69i60l3.2554j0j4&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8#lrd=0x88db4660908016e5:0xaa6c4b80f36a8426,1,,,
–
Google
Members can book courts 7 days in advance
Visiting Cape Coral?
Call
(239) 573-3210
to reserve a court    Guest fee $15 per person
Guests can book courts the night before or day of play
Contact Us
Cape Coral Racquet Club
1213 Ceitus Terrace
Cape Coral, Florida 33991
239-573-3210
Court Hours
Monday – Friday: 8:00 am – 9:00 pm
Saturday: 8:00 am – 4:00 pm
Sunday: By reservation
Weather Update
